1.text: And so it was... The Flyw8t model restarted the system.

2.text: But everything happened again, and again, and again...

3.text: This was, is and will always be an eternal cycle. The bug was an infinite recursion of the same error

4.text: And so the restart process began again and again. The dream of the scientific was true, without him knowing

5.text: He will live forever, and his creation will always exist...
